attributes.comment:
My husband and I have been in the process of adopting a child from China for
over a year now. China has slowed down their process so much. There are
thousands of couples who will have their fingerprints and I600A's expire before
we can even use them. This is a financial burden to many. Not to mention the
additional time it will take us and your department to process the additional
paperwork. It will cost us over $1,000.00 to renew all the necessary paperwork
as it is. With this proposed fee increase, this will add even more of a burden
financially to thousands. We ask that you reconsider this fee increase. It
doesn't make sense to thousands that we will have pay AGAIN for paperwork when
it hasn't even been used.
Thank you for your time and we pray that you will reconsider this fee increase.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Tammy L. Henry
